body:
I don't get why people are hating on her. She never cheated on him or anything like that. Remember, she was single and even thought that he was going out with another girl and he always made it clear he didn't view her like a girl. 

She just wanted one memory with him before she ran off, but only in the end realized that she should have just been honest from the start.

This wasn't NTR... this was just stupid...
fuck off setsuna u dumb bitch! u don't deserves to be with him! so don't dare u meet him, so u can ruin him!? just let him be!

Ohh wait, there's more. I stop reading after the confession scene and rushed a Comment HAHA... She's Baka! She didn't think it through... Damn this shit, this kinds of things breaks your mind hahahaha... But I will not, I will be forgetting this in eternity
Ohh fuck! So the first chapter is the present and the whole netorare is past WTF!? Shit this. Unheart the other post lol
I'm confuse, is it all connected? The first chapter, istit connected to all of it? Or it's just like a different senario that happen than the long run Netorare?
Thot got what she deserved, nothing more.
This story was my first introduction to NTR some years ago. It left me feeling like shit for days.

Ok so The first chapter is after the graduation, when she was already "in love" with the sensei (even already preg) and still she went to fuck with the other boy?? So she cheated both, the sense and the boy?
Nobody say anything for the worse cucked Tomoe?
if u dont like NTR then skip this...u wil regret rest of ur life for reading this :v asdfghjkl
@Junko Affairs - Cry in a fucking hentai ? Get some help, man...
I do not know how I managed to masturbate for this. I'm crying here. What a sad ending. Damn... :'(
Man... With such a trash end, Y&D should have just left this incomplete. This is such a god-awful cop-out and terrible way to end this.
I haven't read anything but I can tell by just scrolling down and browsing the content this story will make me cry. So yeah....... SKIPPED
